Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the upper-body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partly greyish in section and contains a number of a small white inclusions, the interior is covered with a brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394617) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394617)
